# The `TruncatedBLAKE3` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Like <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blake3">BLAKE3</a></code> but using a class-level template parameter for specifying the hash size of the <code><a href="#a74a099d51430f54417d27af6f552d183">final()</a></code> and <code><a href="#adda4f5df8b748e9f3c27dc9872b52330">result()</a></code> functions. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Like <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blake3">BLAKE3</a></code> but using a class-level template parameter for specifying the hash size of the <code><a href="#a74a099d51430f54417d27af6f552d183">final()</a></code> and <code><a href="#adda4f5df8b748e9f3c27dc9872b52330">result()</a></code> functions.

This is useful for using <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blake3">BLAKE3</a> as the hasher type for <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hashbuilder">HashBuilder</a></code> with non-default hash sizes.

Definition at line 101 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h">BLAKE3.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### final() {#a289292a235757336d881f2d2786b09bd}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;size&#95;t NumBytes&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>void llvm::TruncatedBLAKE3&lt; NumBytes &gt;::final (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a081d38a75bd71be1f6b2db493b46c70e">BLAKE3Result</a>&lt; NumBytes &gt; &amp; Result)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Finalize the hasher and put the result in <code>Result</code>.

This doesn&#39;t modify the hasher itself, and it&#39;s possible to finalize again after adding more input.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h/#l00106">106</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h">BLAKE3.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### final() {#a74a099d51430f54417d27af6f552d183}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;size&#95;t NumBytes&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>BLAKE3Result&lt; NumBytes &gt; llvm::TruncatedBLAKE3&lt; NumBytes &gt;::final ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Finalize the hasher and return an output of any length, given in bytes.

This doesn&#39;t modify the hasher itself, and it&#39;s possible to finalize again after adding more input.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h/#l00111">111</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h">BLAKE3.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### result() {#adda4f5df8b748e9f3c27dc9872b52330}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;size&#95;t NumBytes&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>BLAKE3Result&lt; NumBytes &gt; llvm::TruncatedBLAKE3&lt; NumBytes &gt;::result ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the current output for the digested data since the last call to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blake3/#ac459cabc1efbb1af18f617940113eccb">init()</a>.

Other hash functions distinguish between <code><a href="#adda4f5df8b748e9f3c27dc9872b52330">result()</a></code> and <code><a href="#a74a099d51430f54417d27af6f552d183">final()</a></code>, with <code><a href="#adda4f5df8b748e9f3c27dc9872b52330">result()</a></code> allowing more calls into <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blake3/#ad247de2450380eeba2fab0e794d5e44f">update()</a></code>, but there&#39;s no

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h/#l00119">119</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h">BLAKE3.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
